Uses of Class
org.coniks.coniks_server.RootNode

  • Packages that use RootNode 
    Package Description
    org.coniks.coniks_server
    Provides the classes necessary to create a basic CONIKS server, as well as the classes this server uses maintain the publicly auditable key directory and to perform the CONIKS protocols with CONIKS clients.

    • Uses of RootNode in org.coniks.coniks_server

      RootNode RootNode.clone()
      Clones (i.e.

      Clones a Merkle prefix tree prevRoot and extends it with any new nodes in pendingQ.
      static RootNode ServerHistory.getCurTree()
      Gets the current tree in the server's history.
      RootNode SignedTreeRoot.getRoot()
      Gets this signed tree root's root node.
      static RootNode DirectoryOps.updateDirectory()
      Updates the key directory by handling all current pending registration and mapping change operations.
      Methods in org.coniks.coniks_server with parameters of type RootNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Clones a Merkle prefix tree prevRoot and extends it with any new nodes in pendingQ.
      static C2SProtos.AuthPath TransparencyOps.generateAuthPathProto(UserLeafNode uln, RootNode root)
      Generates the authentication path protobuf message from the root node root to the user leaf node uln.
      static SignedTreeRoot TransparencyOps.generateNextSTR(RootNode root, long ep)
      Generates the STR from the root node root for the epoch ep.
      static SignedTreeRoot TransparencyOps.generateSTR(RootNode root, long ep, long prevEp, byte[] prevStrHash)
      Generates the STR from the root node root, the epoch ep, the previous epoch prevEp, and the previous STR's hash prevStrHash.
      static byte[] ServerUtils.getRootNodeBytes(RootNode rn)
      Converts a RootNode rn to a hashable array of bytes.
      static byte[] ServerUtils.getSTRBytesForSig(RootNode rn, long ep, long prevEp, byte[] prevStrHash)
      Takes the components of a signed tree root: root node, current epoch, previous epoch, hash of previous STR, and serializes them into a byte[] that can be used to generate the STR's digital signature.
      static boolean ServerHistory.initHistory(RootNode root, long ep, long prevEp, byte[] prevStrHash)
      Initializes the server's history with the given from the root node root, the epoch ep, the previous epoch prevEp, and the previous STR's hash prevStrHash.
      static void ServerMessaging.sendAuthPathProto(UserLeafNode uln, RootNode root, java.net.Socket socket)
      Sends the authentication path protobuf returned for a client's key lookup.
      Constructors in org.coniks.coniks_server with parameters of type RootNode 
      Constructor and Description
      SignedTreeRoot(RootNode r, long ep, long prevEp, byte[] prevHash, byte[] sig, SignedTreeRoot p)
      Constructs a signed tree root containing the RootNode r, the signature sig, the previous epoch prevEp, the hash of the previous STR prevHash, the signature sig, and the previous STR in the chain p for epoch ep.
